[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6075066][color=#FFFFFF]Award Lotteries[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
Awards are back up for grabs, or are they? Well, sort of... The lotteries feature have been updated to now not just give the winner bytes as the reward for winning but you can now get Hackuman eggs from the prize, to do this you will need to earn the egg yourself and then you may put it into a lottery where members may enter the lottery by using their bytes.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6077131][color=#FFFFFF]Stanley, Intelligence, and /Dev/Null:Ports[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
Have you wanted to play /Dev/Null:Ports but not been able to find a player to play with? Well, Xerotic has made a new single-player mode for /Dev/Null:Ports. You will be playing against Stanley. He is a very smart bot and will try everything to make sure you don't win, he has been watching how everyone on the site plays the game and has been inspired by all of you who has tried the game. Stanley may not be the perfect player just yet but he is still learning from everyone so in the near feature Stanley could be winning every single game you play against him. Watch out.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6061023][color=#FFFFFF]How much have you been scammed on the web?[/color][/url] - [mention=4122598]
Scamming, it sadly has happened to most of us. Valdoking even said they have seen most people get scammed with deals that are really real-ish but also they just wanted to make some easy money from being stupid.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6076856][color=#FFFFFF]8 EGGS IN 12 HOURS!! AGAIN!!?! (Stanley ALMOST DIED)[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
Very recently Stanley has been very kind to flavoral. The member has managed to obtain eight hackuman eggs within 12 hours of posting. they have been very generous with these eggs since he has no way to hatch them all and doesn't want to let them be used in a wasteful way. They have been put into a lottery with the intent to be used by new members who want to win themself an easy egg. Make sure you get a chance to win some of the eggs.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6075999][color=#FFFFFF]Do you prefer night or morning showers?[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
Showering, we all have different routines when we shower. Some people love to use the shower to wake themself up but some people don't find the shower to do that to them. The whole feeling varies from person to person. The member flavoral is asking about this because they prefer showers in the morning showers but are curious about what everyone's preference really is.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6076517][color=#FFFFFF]Time Travel[/color][/url] - [mention=4666921]
Time travel, it may be real and it may not who really knows, but if you could time travel right now what would you change without any doubt about it, it could be as simple as telling yourself not to do something stupid you did in the past even though you learned from that experience to never make that mistake ever again. Whiskey has said they would go back and get a load of bitcoins when they were very cheap.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6075581][color=#FFFFFF]5000 Bytes - ALL MEMBERS[/color][/url] - [mention=4662264]
Are you looking to make some easy bytes? Well, look no more. Because a member currently known as Toosii is giving everyone a chance at winning 5,000 bytes. All you have to do is follow their little requirements on the thread and post and you will have a chance at winning yourself some really easy bytes.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6076869][color=#FFFFFF][$10 BTC] Contest - Multiple Entries allowed.[/color][/url] - [mention=4667696]
A member known as sηүкε is hosting a giveaway that is so-called brought to you by #NotKirbyGang. We don't really know too much about the NotKirbyGang but we sure like to see them giving away bitcoin to members of the site. If you are looking for some easy bitcoin, you really should check this thread out.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6076079][color=#FFFFFF][$20 BTC] All Members Can Enter This Contest! - NO Signature![/color][/url] - [mention=1124123]
Target™ is also giving away some bitcoin to every member on the site, you can easily get a chance to enter this giveaway even if you don't have much time since the giveaway is open till the end of May and you can easily make that. Make sure you get your chance to win by entering now.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6076794][color=#FFFFFF][Free] Giveaway 40$ BTC[/color][/url] - [mention=4692628]
You can also get a chance at winning another $40 bitcoin by entering ramboxx's giveaway. Everyone gets to have only one entry and you don't even need to give them any popularity, just post to enter like the old fashioned giveaways.
[/list]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Fruits Basket Season 2 Casts Umehara Yuichirou As Sohma Kureno![/color][/b]
Best known for his role as Goblin Slayer; Goblin Slayer, Seiya Ryuuguuin; Cautious Hero: The Hero is Overpowered but Overly Cautious, and Kyoji Takajo; The IDOLM@STER SideM, Yuichiro Umehara will voice Kureno Soma in the second season of Fruits Basket. His appearance will be in the fifth episode. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5eb3c782cde4ced331689af4/Fruits-Basket-Season-2-Casts-Umehara-Yuichirou-As-Sohma-Kureno!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Dragon Ball FighterZ Game's Ultra Instinct Goku Video Reveals Character's Debut on May 22[/color][/b]
Dragon Ball Z fans who own Dragon Ball FighterZ will be able to unlock an epic new character through the purchase of a DLC pack. Introduced in the third season's DLC pack, you will be able to add Ultra Instinct Goku to your character arsenal on May 22! An additional three characters will be unlockable too. If you do not want to spend your money on a DLC pack, you can also purchase these four new characters individually instead. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-06/dragon-ball-fighterz-game-ultra-instinct-goku-video-reveals-character-debut-on-may-22/.159297]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]CEDEC Event Moves Online Due to COVID-19[/color][/b]
Unlike most events that are being canceled or re-scheduled, CEDEC or the Computer Entertainment Developers Conference will be holding an online event during the days the physical event was supposed to be held, which will be Sep. 2 through Sep. 4 of this year. For those unaware of what the CEDEC is a conference which promotes "...the improvement of technological strength and exchanges of knowledge and information for people connected to computer entertainment, development, business, and research and development of related technologies and hardware, etc." ([url=https://10times.com/cedc]source[/url]) [i][size=x-small][url=URL]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Bungo & Alchemist Anime's Episodes 5-7 Scheduled for Later This Month[/color][/b]
A few weeks ago DMM Games stated that there would be a delay in the broadcasting of further episodes until May 8 for their anime "Bungo and Alchemist -Gears of Judgement-." The anime re-ran its first three episodes up to April 24 so those in Japan who were unable to watch it would have the chance to do so.  Most recently, the website posted that the series has finished working on episodes five through seven. With that being said, you will be able to watch the fifth episode on May 15, the sixth on May 22, and the seventh on May 29. Due note, DMM Games did not mention anything regarding the remaining episodes. Stay tuned for more updates! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-08/bungo-and-alchemist-anime-episodes-5-7-scheduled-for-later-this-month/.159347]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Chinese Anime Fans Send 10,000 Face Masks To Japanese City[/color][/b]
Fans of the series Love Live! Sunshine!! from China have donated over 10,000 face masks to Numazu, the seaside city in which the story of the anime takes place. The city is a huge tourist attraction and fans of the series can be seen throughout Twitter and Instagram sharing their visits to the world. A local cafe has even been created with themed meals and drinks of the characters. A fan of You? Then you can purchase a special "omurice" (omelet filled with rice) with You's catchphrase written in ketchup, "Yousoro!" The mayor of Numazu, Shuichi Yorishige posted on his Twitter thanking everyone who donated the masks. You can check out Mr. Yorishige's Tweet [url=https://twitter.com/YorishigeNumazu/status/1258383651013713924?s=20]here[/url] to not only see his thank-you note but anime posters that were donated in addition to the masks! [i][size=x-small][url=URL]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Happiness Memories Smartphone Game Ends Service on June 30[/color][/b]
Bushiroad is a very well-known company when it comes to gacha games (games that require you to spend in-game money to unlock virtual items) as well as producing various popular anime such as "BanG Dream!" and the "Cardcaptor Sakura" series. Recently, Bushiroad who is in collaboration with the company Monstar Labs has posted on their website that their mobile game "Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card-hen Happiness Memories" will be discontinued after June 30. Due to the virus epidemic going on in the world now and how the game is in its current state, the developers believe this is the best choice. The sale of the in-game currency known as "Happiness Diamonds" will no longer be available for purchase as of right now. The game was originally released in October 2019 and is based on the "Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card" manga and anime.
[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-08/cardcaptor-sakura-clear-card-happiness-memories-smartphone-game-ends-service-on-june-30/.159379]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hatsune Miku Encourages You to Wash Hands in New TV Ad[/color][/b]
An advertisement airing on Japanese television of the famous Vocaloid Hatsune Miku can be found throughout the day on the channel Tokyo MX. The advertisement was then posted on Twitter. For those unaware of what a Vocaloid is, it is a voice synthesizer software used for singing. It is used to create unique songs or to remix songs that have been created already. Some avatars have been created to allow the usage of dancing through CGI software and the like to create performances of the songs. Those avatars include popular figures like Hatsune Miku. In the [url=https://twitter.com/cfm_miku/status/1256058350485176321?s=20]Tweet[/url] that was created, Miku sings about washing your hands thoroughly. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-05-06/hatsune-miku-encourages-you-to-wash-hands-in-new-tv-ad/.159229]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cells at Work! Characters are Fighting the Coronavirus[/color][/b]
The official Twitter account for the anime "Cells at Work!", also known as "Hataraku Saibou" in Japanese, has released an image by its manga creator, Akane Shimizu, showing off the white blood cell character, Hakkekkyuu U-1146. In the caption, Mr. Shimizu states, "Your cells are fighting germs and viruses inside you to protect you. It's your turn to protect the people around you by staying home now." Additionally, a message was written on the drawing which says, "Do not forget to wash your hands, rinse your mouth, and wear a mask." Check out the Tweet [url=https://twitter.com/hataraku_saibou/status/1257203305295548417?s=20]here[/url]! Although they are not advertising anything to benefit them, meaning, they are not creating this for publicity, this little stunt was a perfect Tweet to lighten the mood and remind people to stay home, be safe, and be cautious and respectable of others. Moreover, for those unaware, Hataraku Saibou will be releasing two new series, one being a spin-off of the original show. Hataraku Saibou Black will be a spin-off about a new red blood cell starting his first day at work and this will air during the winter 2021 season. The second season in the Hataraku Saibou series, "Hataraku Saibou!!", will also air during the winter 2021 season respectively. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-05-08/cells-at-work-characters-are-fighting-the-coronavirus/.159294]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HBO Max to Launch With 17 Anime From Crunchyroll[/color][/b]
With some school semesters coming to an end, those ready to relax and will be purchasing HBO's latest streaming service, "HBO Max", during these troubled times will be able to do so with some anime. Thanks to Crunchyroll and WarnerMedia, they will be releasing 17 series of anime on the new HBO Max streaming service that released this month on May 27. Furthermore, Crunchyroll will be providing new series to HBO Max every quarter. The list of the first 17 anime that will be released on the debut of HBO Max has been confirmed to be:
[list]
[*]Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
[*]Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Director's Cut (including OVA)
[*]In/Spectre
[*]Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken!
[*]Rurouni Kenshin
[*]KonoSuba – God’s blessing on this wonderful world!! (seasons 1-2)
[*]Bungo Stray Dogs (seasons 1-3)
[*]Berserk (seasons 1-2)
[*]Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress
[*]Kill la Kill
[*]Your Lie in April
[*]ERASED
[*]Kiznaiver
[*]Schwarzes Marken
[*]91 Days
[*]The Testament of Sister New Devil (seasons 1-2)
[*]Rokka: Braves of the Six Flowers
[/list]([url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-07/hbo-max-to-launch-with-17-anime-from-crunchyroll/.159332]Source for list)[/url] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-07/hbo-max-to-launch-with-17-anime-from-crunchyroll/.159332]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Little Witch Academia VR Game Debuts for Oculus Quest in Late 2020[/color][/b]
Emerging yourself in VR games is the new trend! For those who have a VR system already, you know how much fun they can be. Combining anime and virtual reality can be a dream for some. There are not too many anime games when it comes to virtual reality, and well, to put it bluntly, a majority of them are sexually based. Those looking for a good time that isn't sexual will be able to enjoy Little Witch Academia's new game sometime this year. The game will first release for the Oculus Quest sometime in late 2020, then the PSVR, Oculus Rift, and SteamVR later in 2021. The developers for this game will be UNIVRS Inc. and that state, "The player becomes a character in the game and can freely fly around the sky on a broom and race using magic. This VR game uses UNIVRS's unique anti-motion sickness technology (patent pending) to greatly reduce the VR motion sickness that has limited VR games up until now. This game will be an amazing flying experience that will make the player truly feel like they're flying!" The game released a Kickstarter in the summer of last year and raised over $76,000. The original goal was only $46,000! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-07/little-witch-academia-vr-game-debuts-for-oculus-quest-in-late-2020/.159309]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]List of Current Anime With Completed Productions; Trigger Premieres BNA: Brand New Animal Anime Episodes 7-12[/color][/b]
A lot of anime have been delayed this Month due to the virus. Here is a list of anime that has been reported completed and will be aired normally:
[list]
[*]BNA: Brand New Animal
[*]Arte
[*]Ascendance of a Bookworm
[*]Dropkick on My Devil!! Dash
[*]My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
[*]Sing "Yesterday" for Me
[*]Tower of God
[/list][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-04/list-of-current-anime-with-completed-productions/.159230](Source for list)[/url]

Also, Kaguya-sama: Love is War Season 2 producers say they are not finished with the anime just yet, but they are at a good pace with almost completing the project. This was reported to AnimeNewsNetwork on April 16, so things may change in the future.

In addition to that, studio Trigger has finished releasing the rest of the episodes for their latest anime "BNA: Brand New Animal." The staff celebrated with joy in a livestream and that is awesome, especially with what is going on today. BNA is a Netflix-exclusive and on March 21, Trigger released the first six episodes before the official airing date of April 8. The remaining episodes were then released on May 6. Once again, to watch this series you will need a Netflix account! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-05/trigger-premieres-bna-brand-new-animal-anime-episodes-7-12-on-wednesday/.159272]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
